CTRL-K
Supported Dexes List by Network (ID Map)
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/onchain/networks/{network}/dexes

This endpoint allows you to query all the supported decentralized exchanges (DEXs) based on the provided network on GeckoTerminal

üëç

Tips

You may use this endpoint to query the list of DEXs with DEX ID for other endpoints that contain params like dex.
You may include values such as page to specify which page of responses you would like to show.
PATH PARAMS
network
string
required

network ID
*refers to /networks

QUERY PARAMS
page
integer

page through results
Default value: 1

RESPONSE
200

Get list of supported DEXs on a network

RESPONSE BODY
object
data
array of objects
object
id
string
type
string
attributes
object
ATTRIBUTES OBJECT

Updated 27 days ago

Supported Networks List (ID Map)
Pools

Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP

CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/onchain/networks/network/dexes \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200

2
